    • Constructor Detail

      • IPNEndpoint

        public IPNEndpoint(int localNumber,
                   int demuxNumber)
        Builds an Endpoint according to IPN schema. It follows the schema: ipn:localNumber.demuxNumber Example: ipn:10.3
        Parameters:
        localNumber - Local number
        demuxNumber - Demux number
